mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(userid, nickname, pw, email) VALUES(#{userid}, #{nickname}, #{pw}, #{email})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET userid = #{userid}, nickname = #{nickname}, pw = #{pw}, email = #{email}, WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE userid LIKE #{userid}
